title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1648-3.2 - Types of subsidy requisitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1648-3.2 - Types of subsidy requisitions

State Regulations
(a) Subsidy requisitions may take the following forms: (1)

Requisition for advance of subsidy to
meet a debt service payment, or other requirements for cash, other than for an
operating deficit. (2)

Requisition
for advance of subsidy to meet an operating deficit, actual or
estimated. (b) Each of
these types of requisition will be separately described in the sections which
follow. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1648-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
